metadata.title: RHBA-2019:1605: OpenShift Container Platform 3.11 bug fix and enhancement update (Important)
metadata.description:
Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform is Red Hat's cloud computing
Kubernetes application platform solution designed for on-premise or private
cloud deployments.

This advisory contains the RPM packages for Red Hat OpenShift Container
Platform 3.11.117. See the following advisory for the container images for
this release:

https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHBA-2019:1606

Space precludes documenting all of the bug fixes and enhancements in this
advisory. See the following Release Notes documentation, which will be
updated shortly for this release, for details about these changes:

https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/3.11/release_notes/ocp_3_11_release_notes.html

All OpenShift Container Platform 3.11 users are advised to upgrade to these
updated packages and images.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2019-1003050 jenkins: Improper escaping of job URLs in f:validateButton leads to cross-site scripting vulnerability.
CVE-2019-1003049 jenkins: Jenkins accepted cached legacy CLI authentication
CVE-2019-10320 jenkins-credentials-plugin: Certificate file read vulnerability in Credentials Plugin (SECURITY-1322)
CVE-2019-10328 jenkins-plugin-workflow-remote-loader: Unsafe Script Security whitelist entry in Pipeline Remote Loader Plugin (SECURITY-921)
